alert.note: Alert for Price (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 5:49AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Price County through 615 AM CDT... At 549 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Thorp, or 17 miles west of Medford, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Price County, including the following locations... Brantwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
